columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the virtual network gateway.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a virtual network gateway uniquely.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of the resource.

columns.name: gateway_type
columns.description: The type of this virtual network gateway. Possible values include: 'Vpn', 'ExpressRoute'.

columns.name: vpn_type
columns.description: The type of this virtual network gateway. Valid values are: 'PolicyBased', 'RouteBased'.

columns.name: vpn_gateway_generation
columns.description: The generation for this virtual network gateway. Must be None if gatewayType is not VPN. Valid values are: 'None', 'Generation1', 'Generation2'.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the virtual network gateway resource.

columns.name: active_active
columns.description: Indicates whether virtual network gateway configured with active-active mode, or not. If true, each Azure gateway instance will have a unique public IP address, and each will establish an IPsec/IKE S2S VPN tunnel to your on-premises VPN device specified in your local network gateway and connection.

columns.name: enable_bgp
columns.description: Indicates whether BGP is enabled for this virtual network gateway, or not.

columns.name: enable_dns_forwarding
columns.description: Indicates whether DNS forwarding is enabled, or not.

columns.name: enable_private_ip_address
columns.description: Indicates whether private IP needs to be enabled on this gateway for connections or not.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: gateway_default_site
columns.description: The reference to the LocalNetworkGateway resource, which represents local network site having default routes. Assign Null value in case of removing existing default site setting.

columns.name: inbound_dns_forwarding_endpoint
columns.description: The IP address allocated by the gateway to which dns requests can be sent.

columns.name: resource_guid
columns.description: The resource GUID property of the virtual network gateway resource.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: Gateway SKU name.

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: Gateway SKU tier.

columns.name: sku_capacity
columns.description: Gateway SKU capacity.

columns.name: bgp_settings
columns.description: Virtual network gateway's BGP speaker settings.

columns.name: custom_routes_address_prefixes
columns.description: A list of address blocks reserved for this virtual network in CIDR notation.

columns.name: gateway_connections
columns.description: A list of virtual network gateway connection resources that exists in a resource group.

columns.name: ip_configurations
columns.description: IP configurations for virtual network gateway.

columns.name: vpn_client_configuration
columns.description: The reference to the VpnClientConfiguration resource which represents the P2S VpnClient configurations.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
